name: Love is War: Rock, Paper, Scissors
name_original: Love is War: Rock, Paper, Scissors
description:
This is a simple fan-game of the anime/manga Kaguya-sama: Love is War.

I don't own any of the intellectual product or have any affiliation with it of course, this is just a non-commercial fan-game to demonstrate appreciation.

The game was made for Week 1 of my game-a-fortnight uni course.

Credits:
Music - Musikage (Season 1 opening 8-bit remix, Season 2 opening 8-bit remix)

Font - m5x7 by Daniel Linssen
